books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel of warmth and humor, despite dealing with serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: An epic tale of obsession and revenge between Captain Ahab and the white whale Moby Dick.
